Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Character
      • HostileCharacter
        • Player
  • public class Player
extends HostileCharacter
    The playable character

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Player​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String attackMessage)
      Creates the starting player with the appropriate name and attack message.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player​(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String attackMessage)
        Creates the starting player with the appropriate name and attack message. All stats are set to 5 with the exception of health which is 10. Level is 1, and exp, gold, and fatigue is 0. The inventory and equipped items arraylists are empty.

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a formatted string with the name, current health, max health, strength, agility, defense, charm, gold, level, and exp of the player

        toString in class HostileCharacter
